name: Heat Gear - Race & Drift World
description:
In Heat Gear - Race & Drift World evade a relentless police force while you clash with street racers. Race and chase hot cars many more in the open world the biggest night city. Feel the intensity of no-brakes-allowed street racing with realistic full-car for the on mobile.

Go from zero to most wanted!
• Modificate your car
- Body color
- Body skin
- Rim model
- Spoiler model
- Under neon light
- Plate customization
- Upgrade car

• Race the 9 different game modes.
- Split mode
- Circuit mode
- Drift mode
- Escape police mode
- Time mode
- Speed mode
- Near miss mode
- Free drift mode
- Max speed mode

• Drive and customize over 10 of the world’s most exciting cars
• Race the way you want in open world the biggest map!
• Use Mods to enhance your car and get ahead of the pack in style
• Experience the action with mind-blowing graphics and intense
• Earn money to unlock new cars

Choose your car, customize it and start racing. If you like 3d open world night city racing games, car driving games and simulation games, download Heat Gear - Race & Drift World now, pick one of the exciting racing modes and escape from police!

NOTE: Heat Gear - Race & Drift World doesn't need an internet connection after installation! Long live offline open world racing game!

WARNING: Heat Gear - Race & Drift World does not have a cloud save feature now. All game progress and in-app purchases may be lost upon deletion of this open world racing game.
